entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 4 except near zero over higher terrain. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Wet snow over higher terrain early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 4 except near zero over higher terrain. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
